summary: this mod is a standalone that uses the ebony shield mesh and fra3nco re-texture.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod and i hope you guys like it
this mod is a standalone that uses the ebony shield mesh and fra3nco re-texture. The texture files I have changed to make the shield not as shiny as the Dynasty Ebony Shield by fra3nco.

INSTILLATION

to install ether use the NMM or drag the esp file into
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
and put the texture dynasty shield folder into Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons
and the mesh dynasty shield folder into
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons

BUGS
if using DSpSoB - Dual Sheath plus Shields on Back by DarkPhoenix the shield doesn\'t want to go onto the players back if you are using a custom race
as far as i know there are no more bugs

CREDIT
Credit goes to fra3nco for creating the Dynasty Ebony Shield texture
author: scott08
